CatDescriptText: Cutline of related image published in New Pittsburgh Courier newspaper, November 29, 1969, pg. 15, reads: "THE POOL TABLE in recreation room of the home of Mr. and Mrs. Robert May, was the focal point of interest during a recent party given by their daughter, Lynette for the New Pittsburgh Courier's 10 Best Dressed Women and their escorts, Miss May (right) is shown giving pointers on the game of pool to (from left) Alberta Thompson, Gloria Grate, Marcella Bolden and Maude Jones. It was a 'Come as you are' affair and guests wore everything from sports to cocktail attire."
TitMainTitle: Group portrait of five women, from left: Alberta Thompson wearing leather miniskirt, Gloria Golden Grate shooting pool, Maude Jones, Marcella Bolden, and Marcella Linette May seated on table, gathered in recreation room in home of Robert May, for party for New Pittsburgh Courier's Ten Best Dressed Women
